title: Kahala Mall
seo_title: Kahala Mall | Shopping Centres in Waikiki
seo_description: Located just a short drive from Waikiki, this fun neighborhood mall offers a wide variety of boutiques, specialty food shops, restaurants & lots more!
contents_1: Located just a short drive from Waikiki, this fun neighborhood mall offers a wide variety of boutiques, specialty food shops
description: Located just a short drive from Waikiki, this fun neighborhood mall offers a wide variety of boutiques, specialty food shops, restaurants, a movie theatre, and flagship stores such as Whole Foods, Apple Store and Ross.
